title: Singly Linked List
subject: Data Structures
theory:
The standard linked list. Unidirectional navigation (A -> B -> C -> NULL). 
- Insert at Head: O(1).
- Insert at Tail: O(n) (unless tail pointer maintained).

real_world_use_cases.description: Simple implementation of undo history stacks.

summary: Building block for Stacks and Queues.
